data.text:
@hywelxo Hi there, may I suggest you to check back later as there is no arrangement for flights in July yet. The situation will be continuously monitored and special ticketing arrangement will be adjusted from time to time if necessary. Thanks for your understanding! 
- Liz

@BoyBattersea Passengers who are unable to tolerate a face covering, including children under six years old, are exempt from this requirement. You are advised to bring along with your medical certificate when you travel for reference. - Liz

Nothing is more important to us than your wellbeing. For your added protection, we now require all our passengers to wear a face covering throughout the different stages of your journey. For more details, please visit: https://t.co/Yh2ipui7Cv. #WeAreInThisTogether https://t.co/OUHQvMFHt3
@karen_karen34 We see that the refund was completed on 24 Apr. Can you please check? - Chloe
@verityfaye Hi there, we saw that we have already refund you on 7th May, you may check with your bank again -Elsa
@afmwong Hi Amy, we receive your message and replied there. Thank you. - Anna

We want to make it easy for you to change your travel plans. To give you the flexibility you need, we’ve introduced a few options for changing your ticket - watch to see which suits you best. https://t.co/wayGsUSbqD
@_kymlang Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thank you.  - Anna
@leannemrichards To make it clarify, if you purchased the ticket on the last day of ticket issuance which is 30 June 2020, you can make unlimited changes till 30 June 2021.  - Anna

@leannemrichards Hi Leanne, the travel date must be completed within one year from the date of ticket issuance and the last date of ticket issuance for unlimited changes is 30 June 2020. It means if you purchased the ticket on that day, you can make unlimited changes till 30 June 2021. - Anna
@vkrulez @cathaypacificIN If your ticket is purchased with travel agent, you may have to contact them for further assistance. Airline would not intervene their refund process. -Vinci

As we await clearer skies, this #InternationalNursesDay we’re grateful for the courage and dedication of medical staff worldwide. Your tireless efforts to protect and maintain health globally inspires us and reaffirms our belief that together, we'll come out of this stronger. https://t.co/frR7LXR8Oo
@aznpotator Hi there, mind DM us the email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@KateHumanRights Hi Kate, mind giving DM your 13-digit eTicket number, full name and email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Tokyo Tower is an iconic landmark in one of our favourite destinations – #Japan. Built in 1957 and 333-metres tall, she boasts impressive views of #Tokyo. Are you quick enough to catch her as she zooms past? Don’t forget to share your screenshot to show how close you get! https://t.co/u0lWegkUza

data.text: @Marymrendall Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ashleighjaneb Hi there. We replied your private message. Thanks. - Anna
@JingMa29824472 It is subject to the Government's restrictions. You may consult The Department of Health. -Vinci
@Dr_Russell1 Hi David, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number, full name and email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@wanderer_mo Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number and full name so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@leannemrichards The travel date must be completed within one year from the date of ticket issuance. If you purchased the ticket today, the travel need to be completed before 8 May 2021. The rebooking can be made before departure. -Joy

We may not all be together this Mother’s Day, but that shouldn’t stop us from celebrating the amazing work that mums do every day. From pilots to stay-at-home superstars and everyone in between, here’s a big ‘Thank You’ to all the mothers who keep us going. You are our heroes. https://t.co/xOB9RhrFJy

data.text: @Chhaysmith1 Hi there, Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Elevate your senses and find yourself on Cloud Nine with this iconic creation. We recommend pairing this refreshment with a nice view for better tasting pleasure. Stay tuned for more delicious recipes next week! 🥂 
#TillWeFlyAgain

Please drink responsibly
Legal age limits apply https://t.co/3smfk7O5ki

data.text: @phil_odonnell Hi there, yes, travel must be completed within one year from the date of ticket issuance (date of purchase). Hope this clarifies :)
@Stretchdiver Hi Steph, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Hands up if you’re looking forward to heading Down Under soon - we know we are! Let’s see how well you know the lovely city of #Sydney. There are 6 differences between both of these photos – can you spot them all? https://t.co/EHTCToobHU
@leannemrichards You may make unlimited changes up to a year after purchase (new tickets purchased up to 30 June 2020). - Chloe

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text:
@Lionk19812000 May you provide us the link? 
Meanwhile please try with the link https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr! 
This will be the easiest way for you to get the latest fares and make a booking. 
-Ella

@Lionk19812000 Hi Leon, sorry for any inconvenience caused.
Can you inbox us with the screenshot of the error so that we can pass to our IT team for investigation? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@AlexWilsonV1 Please share your eTicket no and full name in DM. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@DavidOC37364716 The refund process will take up to 45 calendar days. Thank you for your patience! - Chloe
@KimPear45944219 We offer to all new tickets purchased up to 30 June 2020. And we’re giving you the freedom to make unlimited changes to new tickets, without extra charge. -Ella
@DCTraveler3 Hi there, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRkR51

The Boeing 747-8F can carry up to 135,000 kg, with a special nose opening that accommodates larger cargo. Do you know how many of these aircraft we have in our fleet?

Credit: Instagram@jasonspotter0605 https://t.co/KMWnlryQWC

data.text: @d_yllas You're most welcome! :) - Chloe

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @d_yllas We do operate flights from Hong Kong to Manila. Please kindly check out the flight schedule on https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr. - Chloe
@niharikasahoo @cathaypacificIN Thanks Niharika! May you send us DM with your departure date and flight number? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@phitweee Already reached out. -Vinci
@sukhdev38457819 We would not be able to tell as it will be fine in their system directly. -Vinci
@sukhdev38457819 We have already reached you out there. May we reiterate that airline is unable to check refund status of agent ticket. You may contact your travel agent for assistance. -Vinci
@StormchaserUKEU We do not have updated schedule yet. Please check back later. -Vinci

Seats as cargo holds, crew as cargo marshals, passengers as boxes of PPE – we made a few changes when our first passenger aircraft with cargo loaded in the cabin took off on 23 April. But our focus on safety, teamwork and can-do spirit stayed the same and made this possible. https://t.co/W9AL7xbra1
@santanud007 Hi there, the earliest available flight will be on 2JUL at the moment. - Liz

Stay home, stay safe, stay happy

Your safety is always of the utmost importance to us, so we designed this in-home safety card just for you. For now, stay home, stay safe, and we can’t wait to fly with you again soon!

#MoveBeyond #StayHomeStaySafe #TillWeFlyAgain https://t.co/ciKqHKQhoa

@JingMa29824472 The transit restriction imposed by the Hong Kong government will be upheld until further notice. We suggest you to check out the flight schedule in July as we anticipate a full operation gradually in July. - Chloe

@KTHOMAS93375438 Hi there. Unfortunately we are unable to check here on our end. They will need to contact local sales team through their internal channels. Therefore, please contact them for further assist and checking. Thank you. - Anna
@mcgreevy1993 Hi Natalie, can you inbox us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@eyc1219 You may send us inbox message with passenger full name and eTicket number so we can have a look. -Vinci

COVID-19 has left some underprivileged students with no easy access to online learning. To help them, we’ve refurbished 500 iPads for local students from NGOs across HK. It’s one small way we’re hoping to help our home community get through these challenging times, together. https://t.co/iqJxAT7Jyz

Yet to try our famous Cathay Delight #mocktail or miss its taste at 30,000 ft? Now you can enjoy it at home! All you need is whole milk, coconut milk, kiwi juice, mint leaves and the final secret ingredient unveiled in our video 🍸

#TillWeFlyAgain #cocktailsathome #cheers https://t.co/tUkE3vbXio

@comingofage0913 Situation may change from time to time, we recommend you to keep an eye on https://t.co/xJCN9N4RGJ for travel advisories 
 -Ella
@lsivas Hi there, would you mind to DM us your eticket number and email address, so that we can check -Elsa
@EmmaBlackhurst2 May we have your email address, and eticket number? -Elsa

As global demand for surgical masks, hand sanitisers and PPE has risen, so has our determination to provide cargo capacity. In the past two months, our Cargo team has operated over 1,600 flights to areas where supplies are needed most. We stand committed to connecting the world. https://t.co/7WpKmWaJp2
@matthoughton1 Hi there, we are sorry to hear that! May you share us some screenshot through DM so we can follow up for you? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@ddimpy @makemytrip If your ticket is issued by travel agent, you may have to contact them to arrange for refund. -Vinci

@joydeep17ghosh We are sorry to keep you waiting. As our finance team is experiencing high volume at the moment, it may take a longer time for them to get back to us. We will get back to you once we got any response from them. Thanks for your patience!  - Liz

data.text:
@zigpalmer Hi there, may I suggest you to check back later as there is no arrangement for flights in June yet. The situation will be continuously monitored and special ticketing arrangement will be adjusted from time to time if necessary. Thank you. 
- Liz
@shayne05 Tentatively we do operate but ight schedule is subject to change. -Vinci
@GarrityBigMan Mind sending us DM with the passenger full name and 13-digit eTicket number so we can have a look? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@EmmaBlackhurst2 Can you DM us with his 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Vinci https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@EmmaBlackhurst2 If you itinerary involve US sectors, it would take seven working days. Otherwise it could take up to 45 calendar days. -Vinci
Look closer, and find wonders of the world from the comforts of your own home. #TillWeFlyAgain, let your imagination take flight. What do you see? https://t.co/iFPQLfYwQI
@aznpotator Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRkR51
@amardia01 Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number, full name and email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@nik_kunj @cathaypacificIN Hi there, mind DM us your 13-digit eTicket number, full name and email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@604XRP Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Over the past few months, we’ve been coordinating with local and overseas authorities to bring people home from all over the world on charters and specially arranged commercial flights. Heartfelt thanks to all ground & office teams, and flight crew who keep these efforts going. https://t.co/2wh5iwDbH7

@SkylarkZoe Hi Zoe, in light of the ongoing coronavirus pandemic, and the subsequent travel restrictions and severe drop in demand, we will reduce capacity by 97% across our passenger network in April and May. We will operate two flights per week to Sydney. - Anna

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.

data.text: @NerveFirst Hi there, you may check out our latest flights here on our website https://t.co/wa5i1xZJLr! As the situation may change time to time, you are advised to keep any eye on travel advisories here https://t.co/xJCN9N4RGJ - Holly

We understand that travel plans may change, more than once! If your booking meets the requirements here: https://t.co/Vn3f1xYcuR, watch how you can make unlimited changes to your itinerary easily on https://t.co/wa5i1yhkCZ, with no extra charge.
*Terms and Conditions apply https://t.co/Wd2Y7VxeY0
@yogeshmr Hi there, mind DM us your email address that you made the booking so that we can look it up for you? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@tareenjak Hi there, may you share us the booking reference and passenger full name through DM so we can help assist? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Our parked aircraft are given meticulous attention. We cover their engines; wash and cover flight compartment windows and windshields with reflective material; cover wheel assemblies; and cover internal furnishings in the cabin. We’re staying ready to welcome you onboard, soon. https://t.co/OpPoMb8f9Q
@joydeep17ghosh Hi there, may you send the above information through DM so we can help assist? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@GarethCurtis1 Hi Gareth, you may claim the miles via Asia Miles account but not registered account. You may refer to https://t.co/Q5DTfADwOc for more details. -Joy
@JoelWCross Can you provide us with your 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@JoelWCross We have received a large increase in refund requests as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. The refund process now will take around 6-8 weeks. Thank you for your patience during this busy period.- Liz

data.text: @JoelWCross Hi there, we are sorry that transit is not allowed in HKG at the moment, and we are only able to transit in HKG as we are based in HKG. Please keep an eye on our website for the latest update. Thank you! - Liz
@daniellagraham We would not be able to answer on travel agent's behalf. This will have to follow their ticketing policy. You may contact them for assistance. -Vinci

@karthiknagaraj This would be done in system automatically and passenger do not have to reach out airline for that.
Details you may refer to travel agent. Thanks. -Vinci

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

data.text:
@daniellagraham I'm afraid that airline would not intervene any agent booking's refund procedure.
You may have to refer to the travel agent directly as this will be done via their system. -Vinci

@SamuelWarwood We apologise for any delays and thank you for your patience during this busy period.
If you itinerary involve US sectors, it would take seven working days. Otherwise it could take up to 45 calendar days. -Vinci (2/2)

@SamuelWarwood We have received a large increase in refund requests as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. Whilst we will do everything we can to process your refund quickly, this process may take longer than normal.  (1/2)

data.text:
#MarcoPoloClub members, we're renewing all memberships and unused mid-tier benefits set to expire between May and December 2020 for another 12 months, so you can enjoy them when you travel again. We look forward to seeing you onboard, soon. https://t.co/awyPdn3L7R
T&Cs apply https://t.co/WFLaqGjoJQ

@Ashu08970397 We have reduced capacity by 97% across our passenger network in April and May.
Tentatively we will resume in June but we would not guarantee as situation can change. -Vinci
@sid_kash Can you please let us know the details of your inquiry in DM? - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@TheFoot17 There is no waiver for July. Please check back in Jun. -Vinci
@comingofage0913 There is no waiver for June. Please check back in May. -Vinci
@EngelreyA There is no update yet. Please check back in May. -Vinci
@HAN_i_FLY The unlimited changes waiver applies to any new tickets purchased up to 30 June 2020 but not any existing tickets. -Vinci

Things can change, so we’re offering unlimited changes to  for all new tickets purchased before 30 June 2020 at no extra cost. Make changes up to a year after purchase, change dates, or pick a new destination, as many times as you like. Fly worry-free: https://t.co/i02wignEc4 https://t.co/78rw9KP98b

@JunyiDu2 We have received a large increase in refund requests as a result of the coronavirus outbreak. Whilst we will do everything we can to process your refund quickly, this process may take longer than normal, up to 45 calendar days. -Vinci
